quagga.input.subject: RE: Vitro
quagga.input.body:
Louise,
      I just talked to Fernando Sanchez Ugarte, Chairman of CFC (Federal Competition Commission),  and told him of our urgency
      to have our request approved in the next two weeks.
      He told me he will look into it today and will try to have it resolved asap. Our lawyers should do the follow up, but I am 
      confident we will get it done in time.
      Regards,   Jaime_____
      
      
 -----Original Message-----
From: 	Kitchen, Louise  
Sent:	Wednesday, September 05, 2001 8:36 AM
To:	Alatorre, Jaime
Subject:	

Vitro - we really, really, really need that to close this quarter - please help as much as you can.

Louise Kitchen
Chief Operating Officer
Enron Americas
Tel:  713 853 3488
Fax: 713 646 2308
